search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Shippo (shippo.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Shippo is: [https://goshippo.com/pricing](https://goshippo.com/pricing) .

extracted_content.content:
[![Image 1: Shippo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462967bbf70fa5b5b227351/646bd3ac70ee08fca9869afe_shippo-logo-dark.svg)](https://goshippo.com/)

![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462967bbf70fa5b5b227351/661d50b365da0fb874fd050b_hamburger.svg)

Scalable pricing plans for your business
----------------------------------------

Our App pricing plans are built for e-commerce merchants at every stage of their business.

[See API pricing](https://goshippo.com/pricing/api)

[Free Start with a quick and easy shipping solution. * Best USPS, UPS, FedEx, and DHL Express discounts * Unlimited store connections * International shipping * Automations * Return labels * Shipment tracking * Reporting and analytics * Email support * 1 user login * Connect your own carrier account (5cts/label) * Up to 30 labels per month Get started](https://apps.goshippo.com/join?plan=payg&next=%2Fuser%2Fsettings%2Fadjust-plan%2F%3Fplan%3Dpayg%26tier%3D%26cycle%3D)[$19/mo 1-200 labels per month ![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462967bbf70fa5b5b227351/667b0a37c34c37b0fbc5d6be_dropdown-toggle.svg) 1-200 labels per month 201-500 labels per month 501-1,000 labels per month 1,001-2,500 labels per month 2,501- 5,000 labels per month 5,001-10,000 labels per month Grow your business with branded shipping and more support. * Everything in Starter * Connect your own carrier account (free) * Branded tracking pages, notification emails, and packing slips * Chat and phone support * Up to 5 user logins * Up to 10,000 labels per month. Pro Plan pricing depends on your monthly label volume. Get started](https://apps.goshippo.com/join?plan=professional&tier=1&_ga=2.239126339.1729643597.1719341858-2103856665.1719341858)[Contact us Scale up with dedicated support and more user access. * Everything in Pro * Dedicated account manager * 15+ user logins * Unlimited shipments Contact an expert](https://goshippo.com/pricing/sales)

Compare  
rates

Get access to discounted rates across 40+ carriers and quickly compare rates within seconds.

Buy and print labels

Connect to your e-commerce stores to seamlessly manage and print labels for all your orders in one place. Validate addresses, get affordable insurance, and more.

Track shipments

Seamlessly track your shipments in real-time and send automated tracking notifications to your customers.

Hassle-free returns

Easily generate return labels and provide customers with a seamless returns experience.

"Shippo tells you how much money you’re going to save, allows you to pick when you want to ship, and you can even schedule pick-ups so you don’t have to go to the post office."

"Every aspect of our customer journey has to be perfect, including shipping and fulfillment, and I trust Shippo to live up to these expectations."

### Frequently Asked Questions

Take a look at the most commonly asked questions regarding our App plans. Can’t find what you’re looking for?

[Contact an expert](https://goshippo.com/contact/sales)

![Image 71](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462967bbf70fa5b5b227351/65de4a4bdd74a4db5359d9f6_FAQ-Polygon.svg)

Can I change my plan?

You can cancel or change your plan at any time. If you upgrade your plan, you will not be billed for the higher pricing until the next billing cycle. If you downgrade your plan, downgrades go into effect at the end of your billing cycle, so you’ll be able to access features of the higher plan until then. You can cancel or change your plan at any time on your Plan page within the App or by reaching out to customer support at [support@shippo.com](mailto:support@shippo.com).

![Image 72](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462967bbf70fa5b5b227351/65de4a4bdd74a4db5359d9f6_FAQ-Polygon.svg)

How can I upgrade my plan?

You can upgrade at any time on your Plan page or by reaching out to customer support at [support@shippo.com](mailto:support@shippo.com). Your billing cycle will begin the day you sign up for a subscription plan.

![Image 73](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462967bbf70fa5b5b227351/65de4a4bdd74a4db5359d9f6_FAQ-Polygon.svg)

Are there any other fees?

No, there are no hidden fees. You'll pay the cost of postage, subscription plan fee if applicable, plus optional insurance and optional global address validation fee per lookup.

![Image 74](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462967bbf70fa5b5b227351/65de4a4bdd74a4db5359d9f6_FAQ-Polygon.svg)

Can I connect my own  
carrier account(s)?

Yes, you can connect your own carrier accounts across all our plans. Please note that on our Starter plan, there’s a $0.05 fee for every label purchased via your own carrier account, whereas it's free on our Professional or Premier plan.

#### Learn about pricing for our direct API integration

Get started today
-----------------

Everything you need for professional-grade shipping and deep discounts from top carriers.

[Get started](https://apps.goshippo.com/join)

Shippo's Shipping Software Pricing. Our scalable shipping app pricing plans are built for e-commerce merchants at every stage of their business.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes a free tier and usage-based fees for additional services.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Quick and easy shipping solution for small-scale needs.
features: Best USPS, UPS, FedEx, and DHL Express discounts

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Branded shipping and more support for growing businesses.
features: Branded tracking pages, notification emails, and packing slips

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Dedicated support and more user access for scaling businesses.
